headline: Why The Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. (IPG) Declined on Wednesday
summary: The stock market fell sharply anew on Wednesday, with all major indices ending in the red, as investor sentiment was dampened by Federal Chairman Jerome Powell’s bearish comments on the US economy, saying that the US’ tariff policies could drive up inflation and “move us further away from our goals.” The tech-heavy Nasdaq dropped the […]
